snippet: Stocks on Wall Street stocks slumped on Monday, with the S.&P. 500 hitting its lowest level since October, after weaker-than-expected data on the factory sector.
lead_paragraph: Stocks on Wall Street stocks slumped on Monday, with the S.&P. 500 hitting its lowest level since October, after weaker-than-expected data on the factory sector.

headline.main: Markets Sink as Manufacturing Data Weighs on Investors
headline.print_headline: Markets Sink as Manufacturing Data Weighs on Investors
